name: Denim
description: Classic denim jacket, perfect for casual wear.
care: Machine wash cold (30°C). Turn inside out. Do not tumble dry. Iron on low.
style_tips: Wear over a plain t-shirt with jeans and sneakers.
Layer with a hoodie for a casual look.

name: Leather
description: Classic black or brown leather jacket for a bold, stylish look.
material: Faux leather outer with polyester lining
care: Wipe clean with a damp cloth. Do not machine wash. Do not tumble dry.
style_tips: Pair with jeans and boots for a biker look.
Wear over a plain tee for an easy outfit.

name: Rain Jacket
description: Waterproof, perfect for wet weather.
care: Machine wash cold (30°C). Do not use fabric softener. Air dry.
style_tips: Wear with jeans and trainers for everyday rainy weather.
Layer over a hoodie in colder rain.

name: Wind breaker
description: Lightweight, designed to block wind and light rain.
care: Machine wash cold (30°C). Air dry. Do not iron directly on the fabric.
style_tips: Perfect with joggers and sneakers for a sporty look.
Layer over a t-shirt for mild weather.

name: Black Suit
description: Smart two-piece suit with a modern fit, suitable for formal and business occasions.
care: Dry clean only. Store on a hanger to keep shape.
style_tips: Wear with a collared shirt and tie for work.
Add leather boots or smart shoes for a formal look.

name: Burgundy Suit
description: Smart two-piece suit with a modern fit, suitable for formal and business occasions.
care: Dry clean only. Store on a hanger to keep shape.
style_tips: Wear with a collared shirt and tie for formal events.
Keep accessories simple to let the colour stand out.

name: Plain T-Shirt
description: Simple and comfortable plain T-shirt available in black, navy, and off-white. Perfect for everyday casual wear or layering under jackets and shirts.
care: Machine wash cold (30°C). Wash with similar colours. Do not tumble dry to reduce shrink risk.
style_tips: Wear under a denim jacket for layering.
Pair with jeans or cargo pants for a casual outfit.

name: Mona Lisa T-Shirt
description: Stylish black T-shirt featuring a centered Mona Lisa print. Made from soft cotton, perfect for art lovers and casual outfits.
care: Machine wash cold (30°C). Turn inside out to protect the print. Air dry if possible.
style_tips: Pair with jeans for a clean look.
Add a jacket for a smart casual outfit.

name: Graphic Streetwear T-Shirt
description: Modern streetwear-style T-shirt with bold front graphic print. Lightweight and comfortable, ideal for casual or urban looks.
care: Machine wash cold (30°C). Turn inside out. Do not tumble dry.
style_tips: Wear with jeans and sneakers for casual style.
Add a cap or backpack for a casual vibe.

name: Striped Casual T-Shirt
description: Casual striped T-shirt available in blue-white or red-white patterns. Breathable fabric for a relaxed, everyday style.
care: Machine wash cold (30°C). Wash with similar colours. Air dry.
style_tips: Match with plain bottoms to balance the stripes.
Wear with white sneakers for a simple outfit.

name: Black Hoodie
description: Warm and soft black hoodie with front pocket.
care: Machine wash cold (30°C). Turn inside out. Air dry or tumble dry low.
style_tips: Wear with joggers for comfort.
Layer under a denim jacket for cold weather.

name: Zip-Up Hoodie
description: Comfortable zip-up hoodie available in grey and charcoal. Soft fabric with front pockets and adjustable hood.
care: Machine wash cold (30°C). Zip up before washing. Air dry for best shape.
style_tips: Great with jeans or joggers.
Wear open with a plain t-shirt underneath.

name: Blue Graphic Hoodie
description: Stylish blue hoodie with front graphic print. Great for casual wear with a pop of color.
care: Machine wash cold (30°C). Turn inside out to protect print. Air dry.
style_tips: Pair with black jeans for contrast.
Add sneakers for an everyday outfit.

name: Beige Oversized Hoodie
description: Cozy oversized hoodie in beige and cream tones. Soft fleece interior for a relaxed and comfy fit.
care: Machine wash cold (30°C). Air dry. Avoid high heat to keep the oversized shape.
style_tips: Wear with slim jeans to balance the oversized fit.
Pair with sneakers for a relaxed look.

name: Classic Collared Shirt
description: Formal button-up shirt with a crisp collar. Perfect for office wear or formal occasions.
care: Machine wash cold (30°C). Iron on medium. Hang dry to reduce wrinkles.
style_tips: Wear with trousers and a tie for work.
Add a suit jacket for formal occasions.

name: Casual No-Collar Shirt
description: Relaxed no-collar shirt made from soft fabric. Great for casual outings or summer days.
care: Machine wash cold (30°C). Air dry. Iron on low if needed.
style_tips: Pair with jeans for a casual look.
Wear open over a plain t-shirt for layering.

name: Formal Black Trousers
description: Classic black and navy trousers designed for formal and office wear. Made from premium stretch fabric for comfort.
care: Machine wash cold (30°C). Do not tumble dry. Iron on low if needed.
style_tips: Pair with a collared shirt for work.
Wear with suit jacket for formal outfits.

name: Grey Joggers
description: Soft cotton joggers perfect for lounging or light workouts. Features drawstring waist and side pockets.
care: Machine wash cold (30°C). Air dry. Tumble dry low if needed.
style_tips: Wear with hoodies or t-shirts for comfort.
Match with sneakers for a sporty look.

name: Blue Slim-Fit Jeans
description: Classic slim-fit jeans with a modern cut. Durable denim with a comfortable fit for everyday wear.
care: Machine wash cold (30°C). Turn inside out. Air dry to keep colour.
style_tips: Wear with a plain t-shirt for a simple outfit.
Pair with boots for a smart casual style.

name: Cargo Pants
description: Trendy cargo pants featuring multiple pockets. Ideal for casual and casual looks.
care: Machine wash cold (30°C). Air dry. Do not iron on prints/labels.
style_tips: Match with a hoodie for a casual look.
Pair with sneakers for casual wear.

name: White Sneakers
description: Classic white sneakers for everyday wear. Lightweight and comfortable with durable rubber soles.
care: Wipe clean with a damp cloth. Air dry. Avoid machine washing.
style_tips: Works with almost anything — jeans, joggers, cargos.
Great with plain outfits for a clean look.

name: Black Running Shoes
description: Breathable running shoes with cushioned soles for maximum comfort and performance.
material: Breathable synthetic mesh with rubber sole
care: Wipe clean. Air dry. Remove insoles to dry faster if wet.
style_tips: Best with joggers or sporty outfits.
Good for casual everyday wear.

name: Brown Leather Boots
description: Durable leather boots suitable for both casual and semi-formal occasions.
care: Wipe clean. Use leather conditioner occasionally. Air dry away from heat.
style_tips: Great with jeans and a jacket.
Good with formal trousers for smart casual.

name: Slip-On Canvas Shoes
description: Comfortable and easy-to-wear canvas slip-ons, perfect for daily casual use.
care: Wipe clean. Air dry. Avoid machine washing to protect shape.
style_tips: Easy match with jeans or cargo pants.
Good for everyday casual outfits.

name: Black Leather Belt
description: Classic leather belt with silver buckle. Pairs well with jeans and trousers.
care: Wipe clean with a dry cloth. Avoid soaking or machine washing.
style_tips: Perfect with jeans or formal trousers.
Pairs well with suits for work.

name: Baseball Cap
description: Adjustable cotton baseball cap available in multiple colors.
care: Spot clean recommended. Air dry.
style_tips: Great for casual outfits with t-shirts and hoodies.
Works well with sneakers and jeans.

name: Silver Wristwatch
description: Stylish stainless steel wristwatch with a minimalist design.
care: Wipe clean with a soft cloth. Avoid water exposure if possible.
style_tips: Adds a touch to formal outfits.
Works well with suits and shirts.

name: Canvas Backpack
description: Durable canvas backpack with multiple compartments for everyday use.
care: Spot clean with mild soap. Air dry.
style_tips: Good for daily casual outfits.
Pairs well with hoodies and sneakers.

name: Black Tie
description: Classic formal tie designed to be worn with suits and dress shirts.
care: Spot clean or hand wash cold. Air dry. Do not tumble dry.
style_tips: Wear with a collared shirt and suit for work.
Keep other accessories simple for a clean look.

name: Burgundy Tie
description: Classic formal tie designed to be worn with suits and dress shirts.
care: Spot clean or hand wash cold. Air dry. Do not tumble dry.
style_tips: Pairs well with black/white shirts.
Works best with a suit for formal events.

name: Ankle Socks Pack (3 Pairs)
description: Soft cotton ankle socks in a pack of 3. Ideal for sports or daily wear.
care: Machine wash cold (30°C). Tumble dry low.
style_tips: Great for everyday trainers and sneakers.
Choose black for a cleaner look with dark outfits.

name: Patterned Crew Socks
description: Fun patterned crew socks made from breathable fabric for all-day comfort.
care: Machine wash cold (30°C). Tumble dry low.
style_tips: Good for casual outfits and sneakers.
Adds a subtle pattern to plain outfits.

name: Wool Winter Socks
description: Thick wool socks designed to keep your feet warm in cold weather.
care: Machine wash cold (wool/handwash setting if available). Air dry.
style_tips: Best for cold weather outfits.
Works great with boots.

name: No-Show Socks (Pack of 3)
description: Comfortable no-show socks perfect for sneakers and casual shoes.
care: Machine wash cold (30°C). Air dry or tumble dry low.
style_tips: Perfect with sneakers and slip-ons.
Great for summer outfits.
